Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 10:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: September 06, 2010

Him & Her is a comedy series broadcast on BBC THREE. The show follows the lives of Steve and Becky who only want to drink, eat, have sex and not do any work. They exist together in Steve's bedsit living off state benefits.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Him_and_Her)
